sentences.english: I want a table by the window. We want to enjoy the nigth view of New York.
sentences.chinese: 我要一個靠窗的桌位這樣子我們可以欣賞紐約的夜景。

sentences.english: Toward the back of the room there was a large patio, featuring a good view of the city at night.
sentences.chinese: 在房間的後面，有一個大院，可以觀看城市的夜景。

sentences.english: Arrive Niagara Falls by evening, view and take pictures at the spectacular world famous falls.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚時分抵達尼加拉瓜瀑布區參觀七彩瀑布夜景。

sentences.english: Look at the Night together very happy.
I can recall this evening scene even now.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在我還能回憶起這幅夜景。

sentences.english: Lingfeng night in particular, China can be called Stagecoach ryong'am a must.
sentences.chinese: 特別是靈峯夜景，靈巖飛渡堪稱中國一絕。

sentences.english: The night was an etching in black and white.
sentences.chinese: 夜景猶如一幅黑白分明的木刻畫。

sentences.english: In the nightscapes in Collateral, you're seeing buildings a mile away.
sentences.chinese: 在落日殺神的夜景，你可以看到一英哩外的建築物。

sentences.english: The night view of Victoria Harbour is one of the famous tourist spot in the world.
sentences.chinese: 維多利亞港兩岸的夜景是世界上著名的觀光點之一。

sentences.english: Photo shows the night view of the China Pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲世博園中國館夜景。

sentences.english: The night of Yangcheng town is smoke over the sky, Brighe moon trinidad.
sentences.chinese: 陽澄湖的夜景更是長煙一空，皓月千里。

sentences.english: Harbin in the famous pedestrian street called Central Avenue, the street scene in the night.
sentences.chinese: 在哈爾濱有名的步行街叫中央大街，在街頭一幕夜景。

sentences.english: Afterwards, heading to Niagara Falls for night view of Falls.
sentences.chinese: 尼加拉瀑布區觀賞七彩瀑布夜景。

sentences.english: I watched the night scenes outside the window.

sentences.chinese: 競技場的夜景，羅馬，意大利，1970。

sentences.english: The young man who is enchanted by the night scene does not want to go home.
sentences.chinese: 那個年輕人被這夜景所吸引而流連忘返。

definition: early evening when lanterns are first lit
to overlook/to look down from a height
Victoria Harbor, Hong Kong/abbr. for 維多利亞港|维多利亚港[Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Gang3]
to get a bird's-eye view/bird's-eye view/broad overview
